revised_title: Inheritance in Parthenogenesis: Experiments and Findings
tldr: This article presents experiments on inheritance in parthenogenesis, focusing on the work of Johannsen and his findings on Phaseolus vulgaris beans. The author discusses the concept of genotypes, biotypes, and clones, and how inheritance within a population can vary depending on whether it is sexual or asexual reproduction. The study also highlights the importance of understanding the relationship between parent and offspring correlations and the impact of environmental modifications on inheritance.
